LightningComponentBundle.description: Lightning Web Component for Google reCAPTCHA v2 checkbox integration. Provides human verification for flows, communities, and Lightning pages with server-side validation.

property.name: isHuman
property.label: Is Human?
property.description: Output variable that indicates whether the user has been verified as human

property.name: googleRecaptchaSettingName
property.label: Google Recaptcha Setting Name
property.description: Name of the Custom Metadata Type record (GoogleRecaptchaSetting__mdt) containing the site and secret keys

property.name: originPageURL
property.label: Origin Page URL (optional)
property.description: Comma-separated list of URLs where your flow runs (e.g., https://example.com, https://myOrg.force.com)

property.name: required
property.label: Required?
property.description: Makes it required to pass the reCAPTCHA

property.name: requiredMessage
property.label: Required Message (optional)
property.description: Error message displayed if user tries to proceed without completing the reCAPTCHA

property.name: requiredOnce
property.label: Required only once?
property.description: If true, the reCAPTCHA will only appear once and remain validated

property.name: frameTitle
property.label: Recaptcha Frame Title (optional)
property.description: Title for the iframe element (for accessibility). Defaults to: I'm not a robot captcha

property.name: flowGuid
property.label: Flow Interview GUID
property.description: The Flow Interview GUID ($Flow.InterviewGuid). Required for server-side verification
